title: Understanding VARCHAR
text: VARCHAR is a data type used in SQL databases to store text data. It stands for 'Variable Character' and is used to store strings of variable length.

title: Characteristics of VARCHAR
text: VARCHAR allows you to store text data with a specified maximum length. The actual storage size is the length of the data entered, not the maximum length.

title: When to Use VARCHAR
text: Use VARCHAR when you need to store text data that can vary in length, such as names, addresses, or descriptions.

title: What does the VARCHAR data type usually store?
text: Choose the correct option that describes what VARCHAR stores.
choices: A varying sequence of true or false values
Names of variables used within SQL
